text:
When trying to add an LDAP user, you have to add the base DN onto the end of the
usr-branch property in ldap.properties otherwise it doesn't find the entry. 
However, when trying to login with the newly added user it correctly constructs
the DN from the usr-branch and the base DN and therefor you get the base DN twice.

After looking at the LDAPUser.java I discovered that when adding a user, if
there was no usr-branch it was trying to search over the provider URL rather
than the base DN.  And when there was a usr-branch is wasn't adding the base DN.

This is fixed by the attached patch.

Regards,

Andy
creator: A.D.Savin@bath.ac.uk
